definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: The antibacterial activity of sesamin was remarkable compared with sodium benzoate at the same concentration.
sentences.chinese: 芝麻素的抗菌作用优于同浓度的苯甲酸钠。

sentences.english: The fluorescence of tryptophan residue in BSA was quenched by benzoate.
sentences.chinese: 白蛋白中色氨酸残基的荧光被苯甲酸钠淬灭。

sentences.english: The method may determine the content of sodium benzoate in inosine injection at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 本法还可测定注射液中苯甲酸钠的含量。

definition: xanthan/xanthanate gum (polysaccharide food additive used as a thickener)
